title: My content was removed and the person notifying me seems to misunderstand something
body:
> Hey there. This is Story, Art, and Sound. Your post relates mainly to a Gameplay mechanic - I'd suggest reposting it there since this forum's primarily about discussing the art behind skins, not the mechanics behind skin shards. You might get better discussion there since you've got a good point.


Well, I'd like to follow your suggestion but I don't know which post you're referring to. Could you show me what it was to remind me what I had a good point about?

replies.body: No worries! I was able to find your original post, which had something to do with being able to trade skin shards. Honestly, I think it could possibly be a pretty cool idea as well! Hit up the Gameplay or Client Discussion boards to make sure more people see your idea ^_^!
